Posts.Content: Help! someone please help me. I was diagonsed with breast cancer stage b2 in May 06. The chemo drug Taxol gave me neuropathy in my feet and hands. I had radiation for 36 sections. I am in lot of pain and distress with feeling of sand, pebbles, broken glass  in my feet. Now the doctor wants me on the hormone therapy for 5 years. I read about the side effects of these medications and am terrified. I am already suffering so much due to neuropathy...what will I do when on these drugs. Please anyone in the world who is reading this message help me with a solution. Is there a remedy for people who developed neuropathy with Taxol and what is the best choice for hormone therapy that has less side effects.
Posts.Title: arimidex verse famara

Posts.Title: arimidex verse famara

Posts.Content: I have the same problem and am developing neuropathy in my feet. Very sacred... but looks like there is no other choice...If anyone has a suggestion, please count me in
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Aromasin

Posts.Content: I understand that in Europe, there is a new drug that they give to the breast cancer pateints in the form of an injection once a month. I asked my encologist and she said that she won't give it to me.... has anyone heard of that injection or tried it?
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Aromasin

Posts.Content: why did you stop tamoaxifi? I had severe pains in my left leg with aromasin.  My leg got very stiff with this medication. I had to stop taking it.
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Aromasin

Posts.Content: I like to know too, what side effects you had and what you took to avoid them
Posts.Title: Stopping Aromasin

Posts.Content: I had developed neuropathy in my feet after chemo for the breast cancer. After taking Aromosin, Arimidex, it has gone severe. The doctor thinks it is the medication that is causing it and also says I do not have a choice as they are all same medications. Someone in the world must have a remedy. Plz help.
Posts.Title: neuropathy or side effects of Aromosin, Arimidex

Posts.Content: I have tried all three medications after chemo. Famara, Aromidex and Aromasin. They all have given me side effects.  With Famarah, I had water retention. With Aromidex and Aromasin, I had severe pain in my left leg.  It was like a  log.......stiff and painful. My dr. might give me tomoxofin.... I also developed neuropathy in my feet, pain like broken glasses inside the feet. It is there 24 hours a day. Nothing helps... I have stopped Aromodex since 10 days, and am feeling aweful. Trememdous pain in leg and feet and no strength in the body....I am sacred Can some one help suggest what I can do to relieve this pain.
Posts.Title: Stopping Aromasin
